title: How to Rip Sprites From Jetpack Joyride
snippet: IntroductionRecently, I was interested in ripping sprites from Halfbrick Studiosâ€™ popular game Jetpack Joyride. I downloaded the APK file and extracted it, but instead of finding a viewable image such as a PNG, I only found texture files with the extension .tex. At first I thought it might be an ...
